title: Florida Man obsessed with "Bulgarian Sex-Cam Girl," murders his family, steals $200,00 to buy lingerie!
itunes:title: Florida Man obsessed with "Bulgarian Sex-Cam Girl," murders his family, steals $200,00 to buy lingerie!
description:
A Florida male nurse, 30, found guilty of murdering his family after they demand he get a job to repay the $200k he stole to fund his obsession with a Bulgarian cam-girl. Joining Nancy Grace to discuss: Criminal Defense attorney  Julie Rendelman , Director of the Cold Case Investigative Research Institute Sheryl McCollum, Forensic Psychologist, Dr Daniel Bober, Retired Chief Medical Examiner State of Ga Dr Kris Sperry, and Crime Online Reporter Dave Mack.




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
